description: Adversaries may look for details about the network configuration and settings of systems they access or through information discovery of remote systems
name: Suspicious Netsh Discovery Command
query: (process.command_line:*netsh\ * AND process.command_line:*show\ * AND process.command_line:*firewall\ * AND process.command_line:(*config\ * OR *state\ * OR *rule\ * OR *name\=all*))
author: frack113
Christopher Peacock '@securepeacock'
SCYTHE '@scythe_io'
